reviewText:
Henry is a patient teacher which is good. There's no rushing as he walks you through the various piano exercises geared toward the beginning student.
My only negative comment is Henry's personality which in my opinion is a little dry.
Conclusion:the program offers helpful exercises for the budding pianist but the teacher's delivery is lackluster.
The disc contains two unrelated(to teaching)performances by Chick Corea and T. Lavitz that are excellent +
